mapper.sql: id, duId, visitObject, visitMethodId, contact, number, content, remark, createDate, returnvisit, commentators, comments, demohour
mapper.select: SELECT v.*,m.`name` AS typeName,d.`id` AS d_id,d.`IDCard` AS d_idCard,d.`name` AS d_name FROM visit v INNER JOIN devuser d ON d.`id`=v.`duId` INNER JOIN visitmethod m ON m.`id`=v.`visitMethodId` where v.id= #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into visit (duId, visitObject, visitMethodId, contact, number, content, remark, createDate, returnvisit, commentators, comments, demohour) values (#{duId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{visitObject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{visitMethodId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{number,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{returnvisit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{commentators,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comments,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{demohour,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into visit
id,
duId,
visitObject,
visitMethodId,
contact,
number,
content,
remark,

returnvisit,
commentators,
comments,
demohour,

mapper.update:
update visit
duId = #{duId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
visitObject = #{visitObject,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
visitMethodId = #{visitMethodId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
contact = #{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
number = #{number,jdbcType=INTEGER},
content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createDate = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
returnvisit = #{returnvisit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
commentators = #{commentators,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
comments = #{comments,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
demohour = #{demohour,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update visit
commentators = #{commentators,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
comments = #{comments,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
demohour = #{demohour,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update visit set duId = #{duId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, visitObject = #{visitObject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, visitMethodId = #{visitMethodId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, contact = #{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, number = #{number,jdbcType=INTEGER}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createDate = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, returnvisit = #{returnvisit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, commentators = #{commentators,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, comments = #{comments,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, demohour = #{demohour,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
